product_name: Maui Jim Punchbowl Women's Polarized Sunglasses
long_description: Maui Jim Punchbowl polarized sunglasses are fashionable shades in a small package. They're ideal for everyday sun protection. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Maui Jim PolarizedPlus2 lenses block glare and UV from all angles while managing harmful blue light and boosting colors for clarity and contrast. SuperThin lenses from Maui Jim are 20% thinner than conventional laminated polarized lenses and have crystal clear optics and scratch resistance. Lenses feature a scratch-resistant treatment on the front and back for added durability. Lens coating sheds sweat and water and repels skin oils, preventing build-up and keeping your vision clear. Extremely impact-resistant, lightweight nylon frames offer consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Tortoise/pink frames feature bronze lenses and offer excellent contrast; perfect for low-light and for people who like a subtle bronze hue for everyday wear. Chocolate fade frames feature rose lenses and provide sharp contrast and image resolution; excellent for fast moving sports. Anti-corrosive nickel/silver alloy spring hinges enhance durability. Built-in rubber nose pads prevent slippage. Maui Jim Punchbowl polarized sunglasses include a protective case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: Maui Jim Punchbowl polarized sunglasses are fashionable shades in a small package. They're ideal for everyday sun protection.
